column1: Watching “So You Think You Can Dance” and J-4 was so adorable and such a great dancer
I hate watching Justin Bieber on So You Think You Can Dance. Ugh.
Just caught up on sytycd today and I forgot how adorable Cyrus is.
I love watching people dance. It is so incredible. People are so talented.Â
Alright. I’m watching sytycd and misty copeland is a guest judge and I’m just saying that y’all would probably love all of the reaction shots of her watching dancers
